column4: could someone please help me with NetworkManager not setting up correct routes?
how many NICs do you have?
I have two 3g USB EVDOs which I want to dial in simultaneously ... they get connected but no new gateway is added in my routing talking (not talking about default route)
are both IPs on the same subnet?
they are different ISPs so i assume they'd be using different subnets
have you tried to manually add routes?
i expect to have a gateway entry for ppp0 and a gateway entry for ppp1 but all i get is two host entries with subnet makss 255.255.255.255
i haven't tried that; probably that'd work but I want the PPP to add the entries itself
might need to look into pppd settings for the auto-routes is where I'd start... but manually adding will confirm it works as expected....
i can certainly add them manually but how do i figure out what routes the ISP is issuing me?
all i get is a new entry like this: Dest: 172.16.22.13  GW: 0.0.0.0 Flags: UH Iface: ppp0
ahh, ic... can you get routes with just one interface enabled?  don't forget that you'll need some way to dtermine what interface is used for what IP range....
when you have both enabled... e.g., a router to determine which interface to use to send /retrieve traffic...
might be better off talking abobut this in #networking... it's not ubuntu specific...

because you will need a routing protocol to determine which interface to use for inbound/outbound traffic...  and I'm sure you could use zebra for it, but the guys in #networking would be much more versed in doing so
would u mind if i continue here? ... i think im almost there
I'm just not sure how much more I can help you :)
